siteDescription: Independent VanMoof repair specialist. S3 & X3 repairs, error codes, battery problems. 500+ bikes repaired. Fixed prices, no surprises.
heroSubtitle: The independent specialist for VanMoof S3 and X3. Where official support ends, we begin.
explorerSubtitle: Discover which problems we solve. Click on a VanMoof component for more information.
explorerSelectHint: Click on one of the golden points on the bike to learn more about potential problems and repairs.
explorerClickForDetails: Click on a component for details
componentBatteryDescription: The battery is the heart of your VanMoof. Battery problems can prevent your bike from starting or reduce range. We repair battery issues professionally. Note: no warranty on total battery capacity.
componentFrontWheelDescription: The front wheel with hub motor provides electric assistance. Problems can range from no assistance to strange noises. Price includes adjustment.
componentDisplayDescription: The iconic matrix display shows speed, battery status and more. Problems can cause the display to not light up or show incorrect information.
componentButtonDescription: The control button is essential for operating your VanMoof. Defects can prevent correct operation. Price includes installation.
componentEshifterDescription: The E-shifter controls the automatic gearing of your VanMoof. With Error 44 the bike no longer shifts correctly. We repair this professionally.
componentBackWheelDescription: The rear wheel of your VanMoof can show wear or become damaged. We replace your rear wheel professionally.
configuratorSubtitle: Select your model and problem for an instant price indication. Fixed prices, no surprises.
configuratorDiagnoseFreeNote: Diagnosis is free for repairs over €150
servicesRepairDescription: E-shifter, battery, wheels and more. We repair VanMoof S3 and X3 models professionally. Fixed prices, no surprises.
servicesTransferDescription: Bought or sold a VanMoof? We help with transfer to new owner including QR code and Apple Find My linking.
servicesDiagnoseDescription: Error analysis and technical assessment for €40. Deducted from repairs over €150.
servicesReadyDescription: Make your bike sale-ready with full inspection and adjustment of all components.
servicesSoftwareDescription: Software resets, app linking and digital transfer of your VanMoof.
servicesNotSure: Not sure which service you need?
ctaSubtitle: Contact a specialist directly. Average response time within 24 hours.
contactSubtitle: Have a question or want to make an appointment? We're here to help.
contactFormNameError: Name must be at least 2 characters
contactFormPhoneError: Please enter a valid phone number
contactFormSuccess: Message sent! We'll contact you as soon as possible.
contactFormError: Something went wrong. Please try again or call us directly.
footerDescription: Independent VanMoof specialist. Reliable repairs where official support falls short.
